name: Bittar Design
description:
We're a design & illustration studio. Our work is a mix of those two disciplines and our mission is to help brands with highly conceptual and well crafted visuals for campaigns, products and whatever else we can draw on. Our art direction and design style is diverse and it changes according to the projects we take on.
One of our goals as a company is to be light, fluid and able to adapt. Our model allows us to move quickly and work on projects of all shapes and sizes. So if you have any questions about a specific type of project we highly encourage you to email us at info@bittar.tv with inquiries.
